page.title: 08CHURCH OF ENGLAND: PARISHES
page.content: PARISH :{St.Andrew:St.Anthony:St.David Pop'n : 4300 : 300 : 5000 Area : 8 sq ml : 1.5 sq ml:1.5sq ml :semi-rural: rural : urban : Members: 150 : 28 : 154 Clergy : vicar :team vicar: vicar {Main Service} Sunday : <______Sung Eucharist______> Weekday: mostdays : none :mostdays All are used for weddings, baptisms, confirmations and funerals. There is occasional worship by schools and organisations. St.Anthony's has a burial ground in use.Clergy take services in homes and schools and visit people in need. Churches with young people have{Sunday Schools,}and there are discussion groups for adults. Members arrange social events and offer{pastoral care.}All churches publish magazines, and give money regularly to{world-wide charities.
